AOc.caption: left-meeting
AOc.doc: Emitted once the local participant has joined the call. At this point, the call is considered connected.
AOc.name: left-meeting

AOh.caption: joined-meeting
AOh.doc: Emitted once the local participant has left the call. From the local user's perspective, this means the call has disconnected.
AOh.name: joined-meeting

AOk.caption: participant-left
AOk.doc: Emitted once a remote participant leaves the call
AOk.name: participant-left

AOl.caption: participant-joined
AOl.doc: Emitted once a remote participant joins the call
AOl.name: participant-joined

AQQ.caption: active-speaker-changed
AQQ.doc: Emitted once the active speaker changes
AQQ.name: active-speaker-changed

AQW.caption: recording-started
AQW.doc: Emitted for all participants when a recording starts.
AQW.name: recording-started

AQX.caption: recording-stopped
AQX.doc: Emitted for all participants when a recording stops.
AQX.name: recording-stopped

ARX.caption: recording-error
ARX.doc: Emitted when a recording error occurs.
ARX.name: recording-error

AOo.caption: current participant user ids
AOo.doc: List of user-ids for all current participants in a call
AOo.name: participants

AQP.caption: active speaker
AQP.doc: The user id of the active speaker
AQP.name: activeParticipant

ARr.caption: recording Instance id
ARr.doc: Displays the instance ID whenever the instance is started or stopped.
ARr.name: recordingInstanceId

ARs.caption: recording id
ARs.doc: Shows the recording ID when the recording begins.
ARs.name: recordingId
